Title: Provides tax credits for upstate reinvestment zones
Summary: Provides tax credits for upstate reinvestment zones, for qualified purchases of buildings and qualified rehabilitation expenditures of buildings in such zones; sets credit at 20%.
LawCode: Add Art 23 §460, Ec Dev L; add §45, amd §§210-B & 606, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law and the tax law, in relation to tax credits for upstate reinvestment zones
